verses.verse: (Ps. 19:1) Your kingdom is an everlasting kingdom, And Your dominion endures throughout all generations.
The LORD upholds all who fall, And (Dan. 2:44; 4:3; (1 Tim. 1:17; 2 Pet. 1:11)) raises up all who are bowed down.
(Ps. 146:8) The eyes of all look expectantly to You, And (Ps. 104:27) You give them their food in due season.
You open Your hand (Ps. 136:25) And satisfy the desire of every living thing.
The LORD is righteous in all His ways, Gracious in all His works.
(Ps. 104:21, 28) The LORD is near to all who call upon Him, To all who call upon Him ((Deut. 4:7)) in truth.
He will fulfill the desire of those who fear Him; He also will hear their cry and save them.
((John 4:24)) The LORD preserves all who love Him, But all the wicked He will destroy.
My mouth shall speak the praise of the LORD, And all flesh shall bless His holy name Forever and ever.
The Happiness of Those Whose Help Is the LORD Praise the LORD! ((Ps. 31:23)) Praise the LORD, O my soul!
